turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Bathytoma agnata.
turn.1: What is the scientific name of Bathytoma agnata?
turn.2: Bathytoma agnata Bathytoma agnata is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Borsoniidae.
turn.3: What is the size of an adult?
turn.4: The size of an adult varies between 17 mm and 38 mm.
turn.5: What does the shell look like?
turn.6: (Original description) The solid shell is fusiform and biconical.
turn.8: Each spire whorl is prominently angled at its centre by a tuberculate keel.
turn.9: What else is interesting about this species?
turn.10: In the series before us the proportion of length to breadth varies considerably.
turn.11: How many whorls does the shell have?
turn.12: The shell has eight whorls, including a protoconch of a whorl and a half.
